    Enclosing class:
    ConsoleRouterJESS

     class ConsoleRouterJESS.PanelJESS
extends javax.swing.JTextArea
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    PanelJESS is part of the BeanShell Java Scripting distribution. Documentation and updates may be found at @linkl{http://www.beanshell.org/} AWTConsole.java adapted to JESS Panel inside Node-Agents.
